content: व्यवहृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To deal in any transaction or business. {@--2@} To act, behave, deal with (with <ab>loc.</ab> or by itself); कथं कार्यविनिमयेत व्यवहरति मय्यनात्मज्ञः <ls>M. 1</ls>; बहिःसर्वाकारप्रगुणरमणीयं व्यवहरन् <ls>Māl. 1. 14.</ls> {@--3@} To go to law, sue (one) in a court of law; अर्थपतिर्व्यवहर्तुमर्थगौरवादभियोक्ष्यते <ls>Dk.</ls> {@--4@} To manage, transact business; <ls>U. 1. 5.</ls> {@--5@} To regain, recover. {@--6@} To distinguish.
